name: Rmhp-homebase
body:
Instructors or developers who are interested in adapting RMHP-Homebase for a different non-profit application may freely download and use any of the following resources as a starting point:

1.  [Design document](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B89idqv1KuSVTWVqNkxzZGN1Z3M/view?usp=sharing)
2.  [Code base](https://github.com/megandalster/rmhp-homebase)
3.  ["Sandbox" database]()
4.  [Course syllabus](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B89idqv1KuSVd1pGTml1MDVod28/view?usp=sharing) 
5.  [Weekly assignments](https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B89idqv1KuSVNXF5bktSN21CNjQ&usp=sharing)
6.  [Final class presentation](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B89idqv1KuSVOXVBVFhMaFl1eUE/view?usp=sharing)
7.  [Student evaluations]()

These resources are all licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License.

Detailed guidance on adapting these materials to a new course is available in our book "Open Source Software Development," which will soon appear as a Kindle book.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
